page.title: 13CLUBS IN MAWNAN
page.content: In Mawnan there are lots of clubs to suit all ages and all tastes. For the young there is a{Play group}and a {Toddler group}.For young boys there is {Beavers}then Cubs.{Scouts}is coming soon. Girls can start at{Brownies}then {Guides}.The{Youth Club}is for people from the age of 11. There is a{Mawnan {Wives}and a{W.I.}There is also a {Friendship}club, a{Methodist Guild}and Bingo. The Hall Committee meet regularly to find ways of raising money to maintain the Memorial Hall. There are{Whist drives}every week which the young and old partake. All of these clubs are very well supported by locals and newcomers alike. It was decided that a{Community Centre}was needed with squash courts etc. at the total cost of Â£40,000. After 2 yrs intrest was lost by people who found it difficult to raise the money.
